name: Knighthood (itch) (SMdG)
description:
NOTE: There is a bug due to which the custom cursor appears glitchy and tranluscent.

This game was made under 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50.

This game is about a knight who is on a constant brink of death so he decides to spend his final moments fighting for glory.

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D to move
  • LMB to perform Melee Attack
  • RMB to aim the laser
  • RMB + LMB to shoot laser

How to Play:

  • Kill as many curses as possible
  • Your health will constantly be reducing
  • Killing Curses drop elixirs which can be picked up to increase health
  • The game ends once you lose all your health
